title: Three Miles and $400 Apart: Hospital Prices Vary Wildly Even in the Same City
sub_head: The cost of an ER visit in Boston reveals the wide range of prices at U.S. hospitals
body:
To get inside healthcare costs, The Wall Street Journal looked at newly public data from one market: Boston, home to some of the worldâ€™s most prominent hospitals.
U.S. hospitals for the first time this year had to divulge all their prices under a new federal rule. The goal was to make it easier to compare prices for medical care, just as you can with flights, computers or cars.
